lead_paragraph: An e-mail message responding to an antiterrorism bulletin from the Homeland Security Department turned into a flood of more than 2.2 million messages that clogged the e-mail accounts of government and private experts on domestic security.

headline.main: Security Bulletin Problem Creates Message Flood
headline.print_headline: Security Bulletin Problem Results in Flood of Messages

snippet: An e-mail message responding to an antiterrorism bulletin from the Homeland Security Department turned into a flood of more than 2.2 million messages that clogged the e-mail accounts of government and private experts on domestic security.
